about_the_game: This DLC includes a vanity golden cursor. It does not affect gameplay in any way. This DLC is for people who want to support me as a developer. It's standard for this genre to be free to play, and even with the addition of dungeons in Bounty Below I still wanted to keep it free. The price of this DLC is what I would charge for Bounty Below if it was not free, so this is essentially a way of buying the game after playing it if you liked it. All support is super appreciated!
